TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripPanel extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

public ref class ToolStripPanel : System::Windows::Forms::ContainerControl, IDisposable
type ToolStripPanel = class inherit ContainerControl interface IComponent interface IDisposable

summary.span: 创建一个容器，其他控件可以在该容器内共享水平或垂直空间。

span.span: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以保存一个或多个 、、 或用户定义的控件。Use a to hold one or more , , or user-defined controls. 您可能会发现，如果您不需要四个面板和中心 ，则一个或多个 控件 能满足应用程序的需求。You might find that one or more controls meet the needs of your application better than a if you do not need the four panels and the central . 如果选择了，则只能使用一个面板， 在多文档界面（MDI）方案中正常工作。You can use only one panel if you so choose, and works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios. 每个 都可展开和折叠。Each is expandable and collapsible. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与多文档界面（MDI）一起使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use controls with a multiple document interface (MDI). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/CS/Program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/VB/Program.vb#10)]

span.span: ToolStripPanel Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolStripPanel1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripPanel1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#606](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#606)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#606](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#606)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnControlAdded(class System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnControlAdded (e As ControlEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将子控件添加到 时，将调用 方法。The method is called when a child control is added to the . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
